Art is as good as the last part, but it's NTR+cheating as I expected, so I had a good fap, but also sad hours out here. This one's still a 7/10 though. And again, Japanese people (and really all cultures) have different standards than the West does, so if you can't accept that you can always just not read it. Ask your friends who don't mind NTR for the saucy pages and panels. Not really that hard.

I really don't get why she is afraid that someone would see the picture that they are together hugging? they are not in front of a love hotel or anything indecent so even if the higher ups saw  it they can't say that they are in a relationship which are they are not but they do have mutual feelings for each other. They can say that sensei is comforting her for the loss of a close family member of hers or a pet, as simple as that. Shitty logic at its finest. There are other many better NTR out there, folks. Just skip this one.
